meanings.definition: Full of or motivated by a desire for revenge.
meanings.sent1: Her vengefulness nature made her seek payback for any wrong done to her.
meanings.sent2: The vengefulness look in his eyes warned others not to cross him.
meanings.sent3: Despite her vengefulness tendencies, she always forgave easily.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered with vengefulness, ready to unleash their fury.
meanings.sent5: The vengefulness spirit of the warrior drove him to seek justice for his people.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vengeful.
meanings.sent1: His vengefulness towards his enemies was well-known throughout the land.
meanings.sent2: The vengefulness in her heart consumed her thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The cat's vengefulness towards the mouse was evident in its focused stare.
meanings.sent4: The vengefulness of the ocean waves crashed against the shore relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The vengefulness of the fire burned brightly, seeking to destroy everything in its path.
